activeSegmentPlaceholderDesc: It seems as though there are no active students associated with this organization for the given search query. Change search query or invite new students and then wait for their invitation approval.
pendingSegmentPlaceholderTitle: No pending invitations at the moment
pendingSegmentPlaceholderDesc: After you invite a user, she will appear here until she accepts the invitation. You can withdraw the invitation in any moment
archivedSegmentPlaceholderDesc: After you will have archived the student or withdrawn her invitation, she will appear here
withdrawInvitationModalTitle: Are you sure you want to withdraw the invitation?
